metadata.title: CVE-2018-19839 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In LibSass prior to 3.5.5, the function handle_error in sass_context.cppallows attackers to cause a denial-of-service resulting from a heap-basedbuffer over-read via a crafted sass file.

criterions.comment: libsass: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
